nodes.bodyText:
Either we should leave the class comment out or actually write something.
Empty comment blocks to evade check style dont make sense to me.
A small comment why we can oberride the parent canEdit and ignore the setCommand executability would be nice here.
Same as above. What is the reason we have to override the behavior since this looks like the parent class behavior with less checks.

I only recently learned this one:
If you use a List instead of StringBuilder you can do "{" + String.join(" ,", myList) + "}" you can get java to do the delimiting for you without needing these nasty if logic blocks.

commit.message: Add comments why methods need to be overwritten - (Task #306)
